shield_coinbase_modal.title: Shield coinbase
shield_coinbase_modal.subtitle: Enter Z-Address and press Shield
shield_coinbase_modal.label: Generate new Z-Address or paste existing one

exportwallet.name: Export Wallet
exportwallet.explain: Save keys to some place. Make sure no one has access to these files, because they contain important private information

importwallet.name: Import Wallet
importwallet.explain: Upload exported keys if you want to restore wallet data

shieldcoinbase.name: Shield coinbase
shieldcoinbase.explain: Click to convert mined CRYP from transparent to private.

shieldto.name: Shield to address
shieldto.explain: Add Z-address which will be used for autoshield coinbase. Or leave it blank to create new Z-address on every shield coinbase operation call.

autoshieldcoinbase.name: Auto shield coinbase
autoshieldcoinbase.explain: Auto convert mined CRYP from transparent to private.

quicksend.name: Quick Send
quicksend.usage: Opens the transaction form to send CRYP.

hideinformation.name: Show / Hide personal Information
hideinformation.usage: Hides all personal data, like transactions, balance etc. and replaces them with placeholders.

lockwallet.name: Lock Wallet
lockwallet.usage: This locks your wallet, which means that you won`t be able to perform some of the offered options until you enter your password again (send CRYP etc.).

region.name: Region
region.explain: This switches language to the chosen one. Choose wisely.

currency.name: Currency
currency.explain: This switches the currency your wallet is calculated for. For example: it switches currencies formats from USD to EUR

unlock.title: Unlock your wallet
unlock.info: Make sure that nobody can see your input.
unlock.wrongpass: The password you entered was incorrect.

lock.title: Lock your wallet
lock.info: Make sure that nobody can see your input.
lock.wrongpass: The password you entered was incorrect.

sendPanel.title: Send CrypticCoin
sendPanel.fundwarning: Please ONLY enter an CRYP address. Funds will be lost otherwise
sendPanel.labelInfo: Enter a label for this address to add it in your addressbook
sendPanel.walletAfterTransaction: Your wallet balance after the transaction:
sendPanel.sendWarning: Doublecheck that the wallet address is correct. CrypticCoin Currency cannot be held accountable for loss of CRYP sent to wrong wallets
sendPanel.zaddressInfo: To proceed private transaction please CRYP Z-Address
